sentences.en: As he is arrogant and opinionated, he does not want to take orders from anybody.
sentences.cn: 他这个人很自负, 不愿给人家当下手.

sentences.en: Avoid being overly opinionated or you will alienate friends.
sentences.cn: 不要太固执,免得疏远朋友.

sentences.en: Be opinionated about your product when considering customer suggestions.
sentences.cn: 不要被用户的意见左右.

sentences.en: Didn't know I was that opinionated 2 years ago.
sentences.cn: 不知道我是自以为是,2年前.

sentences.en: He is far too self - opinionated to yield to argument.
sentences.cn: 他太固执己见的,不肯听从劝说.

sentences.en: He is the most opinionated man I know.
sentences.cn: 他是我所认识的最固执己见的人.

sentences.en: He is too opinionated to listen to anyone else.
sentences.cn: 他太固执己见,听不进别人的意见.
他啊,完全是个顽固不化的呆鸟.

sentences.en: I found him very arrogant and opinionated.
sentences.cn: 我觉得他非常傲慢和固执。

sentences.en: One should never be presumptuous and opinionated.
Other households had found her too talkative and too opinionated, forever giving pelf mysterious airs.
sentences.cn: 在别处,有人嫌她太张道, 主意多,时常有些神眉鬼道儿的.

sentences.en: She is an old - fashioned lady and very opinionated, who opposes new things openly.
sentences.cn: 她是个固执守旧的人,公开反对新事物.

sentences.en: She's quite opinionated and very argumentative.
Sue is the extrovert in the family; opinionated, talkative and passionate about politics.
sentences.cn: 苏是家中的外向行动派，性格固执，能说会道，而且对政治非常热衷。

sentences.en: We are much more opinionated here than elsewhere.
sentences.cn: 在这里,我们更能坚持己见.

sentences.en: Your article is full of some of the most opinionated rubbish I have ever read.
sentences.cn: 你的文章充斥着我所读过的一些最为偏执的胡说八道。
